thread.section_title: Maison Souquet - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The epitome of boutique luxury
thread.title_full: The epitome of boutique luxury - Review of Maison Souquet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kustard
title: The epitome of boutique luxury
text:
From check in to check out, our experience at Maison Souquet was flawless. The only disappointment is that we didn't book more than one night!
If you fancy treating yourself whilst in Paris (and let's be honest, who doesn't) then you can't go far wrong here. From the staff and decor through to the bar and private underground swimming pool (fancy!) everything was just perfect. Stay here if you can!
